actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the mandatory retirement age for Tax Court Judges.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to eliminate the mandatory retirement age for Tax Court judges. (Present law requires Tax Court judges to retire upon attaining the age of 70.)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the mandatory retirement age for Tax Court Judges.
